name: tostada
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a Mexican dish of fried tortillas (= very thin, round breads) with meat, vegetables, and cheese on top, or the bread itself: Try the shrimp tostada with tomatoes, garlic, and lemon. I had a crispy corn tostada topped with chicken in a spicy sauce. Enjoy our refried beans on a delicious tostado.
More examplesFewer examplesThe bean tostada is served with rice and fresh salad leaves.Spoon some sour cream over the tostada.We crumbled some fried tostada shells into the soup.The tostado was nice and crunchy, and came with a sweet potato salsa.
